cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on September 21, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8875, Expanding Home Loans for Guard and Reservists Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 150 (Monday, September 19, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. RYAN of New York:
H.R. 8875.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H7966]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

title: Expanding Home Loans for Guard and Reservists Act
